snippet.title: Convicted (Halloween 2023) - Technical Preview (First Trailer)
snippet.description:
This is just a technical preview, showing the most basic features already implemented in the game.

Convicted is a 2D top-down asymmetrical multiplayer horror game inspired by SCP and Space Station 13.

📝 𝗜𝗻𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱? 𝗕𝗲 𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗲 𝘁𝗼 𝘄𝗶𝘀𝗵𝗹𝗶𝘀𝘁 𝗼𝗻 𝗦𝘁𝗲𝗮𝗺!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2519700/Convicted/



Hall of the Mountain King by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1200072

Artist: http://incompetech.com/
